title: Fed Cuts Rates 50bps in December 2025 – Powell Signals More Easing Coming
shortdescription: Markets rally 3% as Fed confirms soft landing achieved – inflation at 2.1%.
description: FOMC votes 11-1 for aggressive cut as unemployment stabilizes and inflation falls below target. Powell: "We are now in a position to support growth."
author: Macro Anton

title: China Unveils $2 Trillion Stimulus Package – Biggest Since 2008
shortdescription: Beijing floods economy with cash to hit 5% growth target – global markets surge.
description: People's Bank of China cuts rates to zero and launches direct consumer stimulus — copper, iron ore, and Australian dollar spike overnight.
author: Macro Anton

title: Germany Officially Enters Recession – Worst Since 2009
shortdescription: Two consecutive quarters of contraction confirmed – energy crisis and China slowdown blamed.
description: German GDP contracts 0.4% in Q4 after -0.3% in Q3 — manufacturing PMI hits 38, lowest since pandemic. Euro falls below parity again.
author: Macro Anton

title: India Posts 8.2% GDP Growth – Officially World's Fastest Growing Major Economy
shortdescription: Surpasses China for third straight year – set to become #3 economy by 2027.
description: Services exports, manufacturing boom, and infrastructure spending drive growth — IMF upgrades India to 8% for 2025-26.
author: Macro Anton

title: U.S. National Debt Hits $36 Trillion – Interest Payments Now Larger Than Defense Budget
shortdescription: Interest on debt exceeds $1.2T annually – bigger than entire military spending.
description: CBO warns debt-to-GDP ratio will hit 130% by 2030 — Treasury yields spike as foreign buyers pull back.
author: Macro Anton

title: Saudi Vision 2030 Declared Success – Non-Oil Revenue Now 60% of GDP
shortdescription: Kingdom reduces oil dependence dramatically – tourism and tech sectors explode.
description: NEOM, Red Sea Project, and entertainment cities generate $80B annually — oil now only 40% of government revenue.
author: Macro Anton

title: UK Inflation Turns Negative for First Time Since 1960 – Deflation Fears Grip London
shortdescription: Energy price crash and weak demand push CPI to -0.3% — BoE in emergency meeting.
description: Post-Brexit trade disruptions and energy windfall cause first deflation in 65 years — pound drops 5% in one day.
author: Macro Anton

title: Brazil's New Economic Miracle: 5.8% Growth and Falling Inflation Shock World
shortdescription: Lula's policies + commodity boom = fastest growth in Latin America.
description: Soy, iron ore, and oil exports surge while inflation drops to 3.2% — real strengthens 18% against dollar.
author: Macro Anton
